original_text: The shaft of his spear was like a weaver's beam, and his spear's head weighed six hundred shekels of iron. And his shield-bearer went before him.
korean_text: 그 창 자루는 베틀 채 같고 창 날은 철 육백 세겔이며 방패 든 자가 앞서 행하더라

sentences.original_text: The shaft of his spear was like a weaver's beam
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 창 자루는 베틀의 북과 같았다.

sentences.original_text: and his spear's head weighed six hundred shekels of iron
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 창끝은 철 육백 세겔이 나갔다.

sentences.original_text: And his shield-bearer went before him
sentences.korean_translation: 방패 든 자가 그의 앞에 행하였더라.
